name: Savory Stilton and Walnut Bread Pudding
author: Garampy09
summary: This recipe is for a savory cake. I cut the cake into bite-sized pieces - perfect for a party or picnic. This pudding is just as good when served cold. Keeps well in the fridge and also freezes well. Enjoy!
ingredients: ½ (1 pound) loaf brioche, cut into small cubes and crusts removed
¾ teaspoon freshly ground black pepper
directions: Place brioche cubes in a large bowl; cover with 1 cup plus 2 tablespoons milk
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease a 9x11-inch baking dish with 1 teaspoon butter
Stir 1/4 cup melted butter and egg into the brioche mixture
Mix Stilton cheese, walnuts, sage, rosemary, Dijon mustard, mixed spice, salt, and pepper together in a separate bowl
Add to the brioche mixture; mash until mixture is smooth and no lumps remain
Spread mixture in the prepared baking dish
Grate some fresh nutmeg on top
Bake in the preheated oven until golden brown, 40 to 45 minutes
